name: 灯織
text: （ふぅ。今日のレッスンはこんなところかな）
trans: (Whew. I guess that would be enough lessons for today.)

name: 灯織
trans: (I better head home now.)

name: めぐる
trans:
Ah, Hiori.
Hello!

name: 灯織
trans: Hello.

name: めぐる
text: わたしもレッスン終わったところだし、一緒に帰ろう！
trans: I just finished my lessons too, so let's go home together!

name: 灯織
trans: Eh? I don't mind though.

name: めぐる
trans: Really?

name: めぐる
trans: Yay! Alright!

name: 灯織
text: 一緒に帰るだけで、何でそんなに嬉しそうなの……
trans: We're just going home together but, how come you're that happy?

name: めぐる
text:
えへへ～細かいことは気にしないでさ
さ、行こ行こ～っ！
trans:
Ehehe  Don't worry about the small things.
Come on, let's go!

name: めぐる
trans: Hmm, hmm-mm, hmmm.

name: 灯織
text: （レッスン後なのに、元気な子……）
trans: (She still has a lot of energy, even though we've just finished doing our lessons.)

name: 灯織
trans: What is making you feel so happy?

name: めぐる
text:
えー、灯織と一緒に帰れるんだから
楽しいに決まってるよー！
trans: Eh? I'm going home with you so, of course, I'm going to be happy!

name: めぐる
text:
それに、レッスンも一緒にできてね、
すっごく楽しかったよ！
trans: Besides, being able to do our lessons together was really fun!

name: 灯織
trans: (Fun? With me?)

name: 灯織
trans: Really?

name: めぐる
text:
そうだよ！
だからね、もっと灯織と仲良くなれたら嬉しいな！
trans:
Yes!
Which is why, it'd be really nice if we get even closer!

name: 灯織
trans: Get closer with me?

name: めぐる
text:
もーっと一緒にレッスンもしたいし……
そしたらダンスとか歌もきっとぴったりになるし……
trans:
And I also want to do more lessons together.
If we do that, I'm sure that we'll become in synce when it comes to things like dancing and singing.

name: めぐる
text:
あっ、それにさ、レッスンたくさん一緒にやれば、
それだけたっくさん一緒に帰れるよねっ！
trans: Oh, and if we do more lessons together, we'll be able to go home together as well!

name: 灯織
trans: Well, that's true.

name: めぐる
text:
えっへへ！
そう思うと、これからもすっごい楽しみだな～！
trans:
Ehehe
Just thinking about that makes me look forward to it even more!

name: めぐる
text:
あ、そうだ！
ここは友情のハグを――
trans:
Ah, that's right!
This is where we do the Hug of Friendship, so──

name: 灯織
trans: No.

name: めぐる
text:
うぐ……
何で止めるの……
trans:
Ugh...
Why are you putting a stop to this?

name: 灯織
trans: Don't get too carried away.

name: めぐる
text: ぶー。せっかく仲良くなれるチャンスだったのにー！
trans: Boo. That was a great chance to get even closer!

name: 灯織
trans: Because, well...

name: 灯織
text: ……仲良くなるにしても、少しずつ、だから
trans: Even getting closer to someone has to be done one step at a time.

name: めぐる
trans: Hiori!

name: 灯織
trans: Come on, let's hurry up and go home.

name: めぐる
trans: Okay!
